title: All in a Name
description: Michael Pennington was the first and only man Kate O'Smiley had loved. And he, too, was bewitched. But when a war of wills sent them their separate ways, all she took with her were memories, her recipes... and Michael's name.Kate thought Pennington's sounded perfect for her restaurant and catering business. Unfortunately, Michael disagreed—strenuously—and his anger drove him to seek her out. It was only then they realized passion had been simmering on the back burner for five long years....
author: Carla Neggers
